statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection_results ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, inspector_name FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspection_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT inspector_name) AS number_of_inspectors FROM quality_control_inspection_results;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_id, inspector_name FROM quality_control_inspection_results ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(inspection_id) AS avg_inspection_id FROM quality_control_inspection_results;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM quality_control_inspection_results GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT inspection_date, COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspection_result = 'Fail' GROUP BY inspection_date ORDER BY total_results DESC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspections
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date FROM QualityControlInspections WHERE passed = TRUE
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM ProductTraceability
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT product_name FROM ProductTraceability WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspections WHERE passed = true ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM ProductTraceability WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT product_id, inspection_date FROM QualityControlInspections WHERE passed = false AND product_id = 100
SELECT MAX(manufacturing_date) AS latest_manufacturing_date FROM ProductTraceability
SELECT QC.product_id, QC.inspection_date, PT.product_name FROM QualityControlInspections QC INNER JOIN ProductTraceability PT ON QC.product_id = PT.product_id
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspections;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT inspector_name, department FROM Inspectors ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics' AND production_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT inspector_name, department, experience_years FROM Inspectors WHERE experience_years > 5 AND department = 'Quality Control';
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date, inspection_result FROM QualityControlInspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, production_date, manufacturer FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT inspector_name, department, experience_years FROM Inspectors WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY department, inspector_name;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspections LEFT JOIN Products ON QualityControlInspections.product_id = Products.product_id;

SELECT inspector_name, department, COUNT(inspection_id) AS total_inspections FROM QualityControlInspections JOIN Inspectors ON QualityControlInspections.inspector_name = Inspectors.inspector_name GROUP BY inspector_name, department ORDER BY total_inspections DESC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspectionResults;
SELECT inspection_id, product_id, inspection_date FROM QualityControlInspectionResults ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, department FROM Inspector WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date, manufacturer FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT trace_id, product_id, location, event_description FROM ProductTraceability ORDER BY trace_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlInspectionResults ORDER BY inspection_date DESC, inspector_id ASC
SELECT product_name, product_category, manufacturing_date FROM Product WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Manufacturing'
SELECT inspector_name, department, hire_date FROM Inspector WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date ASC

SELECT QC.inspection_id, P.product_name, TR.trace_date, TR.location FROM QualityControlInspectionResults QC LEFT JOIN Product P ON QC.product_id = P.product_id LEFT JOIN ProductTraceability TR ON P.product_id = TR.product_id
SELECT * FROM ProductTraceability WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND event_description LIKE '%received%' ORDER BY trace_date DESC
SELECT * FROM inspection_results;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM product ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, department, hire_date FROM inspector WHERE department='Quality Control';
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM product WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT defect_description, defect_severity FROM defects WHERE defect_severity='High' ORDER BY inspection_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inspection_results WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type FROM product WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Manufacturing' ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspecton_date FROM inspection_results WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' AND result = 'Fail' ORDER BY inspecton_date ASC;
SELECT inspector_name, department, hire_date FROM inspector ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT defect_id, defect_description, defect_severity FROM defects WHERE defect_severity = 'High' ORDER BY defect_id ASC;
